definition: luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Weighted abundance approach is suitable for the quantitative prediction in a target area with multi-mineral mineralizing series.
sentences.chinese: 加权丰度适合于多矿种的矿化系列的靶区定量预测。

sentences.english: There is an argument to express them in ground level abundance of the respective elements.
sentences.chinese: 有理由把它们用相应元素的地平丰度来表示。

sentences.english: The gold content of the Archean Taihua Group greenstone belt is lower than Clarke value.
sentences.chinese: 太古宙太华群绿岩带金的丰度低于克拉克值。

sentences.english: The extraction of the high thick dietary fibre from the low-priced corncob was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨从廉价的玉米芯中制备高丰度的膳食纤维。

sentences.english: A co-inertia analysis showed that species abundance and environmental variables had significant relationship.
sentences.chinese: 协惯量分析结果表明，相对丰度与环境变量显著相关。

sentences.english: With regards to density of natural resources, there is a tendency of strengthening from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 在自然资源分布丰度上，从东到西呈强化趋势。

sentences.english: There was no significant change of HSP27 expression in both groups.
sentences.chinese: 两组HSP27基因表达丰度均无明显改变。

sentences.english: This instrument can be used for gas analysis and determine of isotopic abundance of light elements.
sentences.chinese: 此仪器可用于气体分析以及轻元素的同位素丰度测定。

sentences.english: One clue comes from the metallicity of the disc’s constituent stars.
sentences.chinese: 一条线索来自于主盘内恒星的金属丰度。

sentences.english: Long-term outcomes for the planktonic abundance of these three phyla are different, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而这三种浮游动物丰度的长期观测结果却是不同的。

sentences.english: The abundance of organic matter is to describe hydrocarbon source rock.
sentences.chinese: 有机质丰度是烃源岩的数量特征。

sentences.english: It was more difficult for the microarray to distinguish the expression variation of less abundant genes.
sentences.chinese: 微阵列更难于区分较小丰度基因的表达变化。

sentences.english: The abundance and diversity of radiolaria fossils are high in the clay of basin.
sentences.chinese: 海盆区粘土沉积物中的放射虫化石丰度高且分异度高。

sentences.english: Annual fluctuation in distribution and abundance of larvae was evident.
sentences.chinese: 分布和丰度的年际变化明显。

sentences.english: The variation patterns of cell abundance are largely consistent with those shown by historical data, except for certain cases.
sentences.chinese: 冬季的细胞丰度在各站之间变化幅度是最小的。

sentences.english: As cognate rock and source rock, it is characterised by high abundance and easy mobilization.
sentences.chinese: 岩体以易活化金丰度高为突出特征。

definition: components/individual parts making up a compound
